shouldUseCrossAccountOwnerNameAsCrossAcc.description: Whether to use the name of the owner of a cross account as the description instead of the masked account number

houseHoldingCreditCardHistoryEnabled.description: Whether householding credit card history is enabled

acceptanceEnabled.description: Whether cross accounts (householding) disclosure acceptance feature is enabled

acceptanceFlag.description: Cross accounts (householding) disclosure acceptance flag name on core

hideAbilityToRequestPermissionsForAnothe.description: Whether to hide the request permissions button/page for another account

shouldShowSsoLinkForCrossAccountLoans.description: Whether to show SSO link for cross account loans

disallowWithdrawalsFromCreditCards.description: Whether to disallow withdrawals from credit cards on cross-account access screens

disableCreditCardMoreDetailButton.description: Whether to disable the 'more details' button next to credit cards in the card summary section

getHouseholdingPermissionsFromCrossAccou.description: Whether to use the CrossAccountNode that has already been mapped to set the HouseHoldingAccess

readCreditCardsFromCore.description: Whether to read credit cards from core

isCrossAccountInquiryByTin.description: Whether to use the TIN when performing account inquiry

inquiry.description: Delay time for granting inquiry permission

deposit.description: Delay time for granting deposit permission

withdrawal.description: Delay time for granting withdrawal permission

checkHouseHoldingValuesFromDatabase.description: Whether to check householding values from database

deleteSubAccountNoHouseholding.description: Whether to delete sub-account with no householding
